mapper.select: select distinct student.student_id, student_name,student_group.group_name,mentor_name, project.* from project, project_management, student_group, student, mentor where project_management.Group_id = student_group.group_id and project.project_id = project_management.project_id and student_group.group_student_id = student_id and mentor.mentor_id = project_management.mentor_id and student.student_id = #{studentId};

select project.*, student_group.group_id, student_group.group_name, mentor.mentor_id, mentor_name from project, project_management,mentor,student_group where project_management.project_id = project.project_id and project_management.Group_id = student_group.group_id and project_management.mentor_id = mentor.mentor_id;
select distinct * from project,student_group,mentor where project.mentor_id = mentor.mentor_id ;
